rustysword.name: Rusty Sword
rustysword.description: Makes cards containing Samurai or Insomniac more likely to be pulled.

cafemixtape.name: Cafe Mixtape
cafemixtape.description: Makes cards containing Cole Brew or Nicole Ting more likely to be pulled.

oversizedstethoscope.name: Oversized Stethoscope
oversizedstethoscope.description: Makes cards containing Paige or Ian more likely to be pulled.

valentinesdaycard.name: Valentines Day Card
valentinesdaycard.description: Makes cards containing Logan or Hailey more likely to be pulled.

hardcandy.name: Hard Candy
hardcandy.description: Makes cards containing Mr. Stevenson or Mrs. Stevenson more likely to be pulled.

deluxebirdseed.name: Deluxe Birdseed
deluxebirdseed.description: Makes cards containing a bird more likely to be pulled.

brokenmouse.name: Broken Mouse
brokenmouse.description: Skips yes/no prompt for storing cards, equipping items, and using the strange machine

stoppedwatch.name: Stopped Watch
stoppedwatch.description: Brings the c!pull timer down to 10 hours.

faithfulnecklace.name: Faithful Necklace
faithfulnecklace.description: Brings the c!pray timer down to 2.5 days.
